tasks.description: Understand the dependency array and when to clean up effects.
Organize components, context, and pages folders.
Move the tasks array and CRUD functions into TasksContext.jsx.
Define routes for '/', '/add', and '/edit/:id' in App.jsx.
Build the AddTask form and manage input state with useState.
Write the async fetch function for adding new tasks to json-server.
Ensure the deleteTask function sends the DELETE request and updates the local state.
Use useParams and getTaskById to pre-fill the modification form.
Use classes like 'input input-bordered' and 'select select-bordered' for Add/Edit forms.
Test full CRUD cycle, status changes, and responsive design.
